section.title: Related Web References
section.para: The following Web references provide information on open source offerings integrated with CMM:

listitem.para: OpenStack : Documentation on OpenStack, the underlying platform technology.
OpenStack Horizon : Documentation on the OpenStack Horizon dashboard.
Monasca Wiki : Information on Monasca, the core of CMM.

section.para: More detailed Web references provided in this manual are subject to change without notice.
